column4: Peasants are rising in the countryside, looting and lynching aristocrats.

column5: Nobility is gaining more influence in our country.
column6: The influence of Aristocracy has diminished.

column4: The head of state is a king with absolute powers.

column4: Our actions have isolated us from the global community. Only a handful of countries still want to trade with us and we lost many trade partners. Our entrepreneurs and business-owners are outraged at us.
